scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test: npm run build && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./test/commitSale.test.cjs && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./test/resolveStoreAccess.test.cjs && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./test/handleUserCreate.test.cjs && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./test/onAuthCreate.test.cjs && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./test/initializeStore.test.cjs
